entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
